---
title: "Assign documentation section statuses"
date: last-modified
---

Assign a completion status to individual sections of your model documentation that will be reflected in your Document Overview.

::: {.prereq}

## Prerequisites

- [x] {{< var link.login >}}
- [x] The model is already registered in the model inventory.[^1]
- [x] You are a `Developer` or assigned another role with sufficient permissions to perform the tasks in this guide.[^2]

:::

## Steps

1. In the left sidebar, click **Model Inventory**.

2. Select a model by clicking on it or find your model by applying a filter or searching for it.[^3]

3. In the left sidebar that appears for your model, click **Documentation**.

   Jump to any section of the model documentation by selecting the relevant section you would like to view.

4. Next to the heading of each section, you can assign a status from the drop-down:
    - **In Progress**
    - **Done**

The documentation completion status summary will then be updated on your Document Overview[^4] page.
